SEARCH
Package Characters

Class Character

java.lang.Object
Characters.Character
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bomb, EnemyMush, EnemyRock, EnemySlug, JackBomber
public class Character extends Object
The base class for all characters in the game, including players and enemies. It holds common attributes such as position, direction, sprite animations, and state flags like collision and level progression.

    • setLevelStartTime

      Parameters:
      levelStartTime - the start time in milliseconds.

    • isAlive

      public boolean isAlive()
      Returns whether the character is currently alive.
      Returns:
      true if the character is alive, false otherwise.

    • setAlive

      public void setAlive(boolean alive)
      Sets the alive status of the character.
      Parameters:
      alive - true to mark the character as alive, false otherwise.

    • isDoorFound

      public boolean isDoorFound()
      Returns whether the character has found the exit door.
      Returns:
      true if the door has been found, false otherwise.

    • setDoorFound

      public void setDoorFound(boolean doorFound)
      Sets whether the character has found the exit door.
      Parameters:
      doorFound - true if the door has been found, false otherwise.

    • isLevelUp

      public boolean isLevelUp()
      Returns whether the character has triggered a level-up.
      Returns:
      true if the character leveled up, false otherwise.

    • setLevelUp

      public void setLevelUp(boolean levelUp)
      Sets whether the character has triggered a level-up.
      Parameters:
      levelUp - true to mark the character as having leveled up, false otherwise.
